      public com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.Tag delete(int id) throws com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.CertificateAssociatedException

      Specified by:
      delete in interface com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.services.TagService
      Parameters:
      id - Specific Tag ID to look for and drop in Database
      Returns:
      Tag dropped
      Throws:
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound - Exception thrown when given ID is not found

      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.CertificateAssociatedException - Exception thrown when Tag is associated to a GiftCertificate and cannot be deleted
